```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(ggthemes)
library(magrittr)


```

#This assumes emailDFrp is built and ready to go...

```{r fig.height=8, fig.width=8}
AsVector<-emailDF[,c(2:30)]
cormat<- (round(cor(AsVector),2))
cormat <- reshape::melt(cormat)
cormat %>% ggplot(aes(x=X1, y=X2, fill=value)) + geom_tile() + theme(legend.position = "bottom", axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90, vjust=-.5))


```
